require 'aws-sdk-sqs' # v2: require 'aws-sdk' # Replace us-west-2 with the AWS Region you're using for Amazon SQS. sqs = Aws::SQS::Client.new(region: 'us-west-2')
resp = sqs.receive_message(queue_url: URL, max_number_of_messages: 10, wait_time_seconds: 10)
resp.messages.each do |m| puts m.body end
